name: Roober
description:
Roober is a worm who is looking for a way out of the jungle, your task is to help him find his way. The problem is, the jungle is a maze! Be careful: in the jungle, traps and moving platforms are waiting for you.

This game is a 3D platformer where you have to get Roober, a worm, out of the jungle. Along the way, you will encounter traps, moving platforms, and plenty of Roober Coin that you can use to buy outfits and boosts that can help you!

Can you help Roober find his way out of the jungle?
